description: This file contains a custom exception class 'NotFoundException' used for handling 404 scenarios within a larger Java application, specifically within the notes backend module.

classes.name: NotFoundException
classes.description: A custom runtime exception indicating a resource was not found, with an associated error code 'NOT_FOUND'.

methods.name: NotFoundException
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the exception message and sets the error code to 'NOT_FOUND'.

methods.name: getCode
methods.description: Retrieves the error code associated with this exception, which is 'NOT_FOUND'.
